text: Robert "Bob" Geigel (October 1, 1924 â€“ October 30, 2014) was an American professional wrestling promoter and also a professional wrestler. Geigel ran the NWA Central States promotion between 1963 and 1986, until it was bought out by Jim Crockett Promotions. He was also president of the National Wrestling Alliance for most of the years 1978 to 1987. Geigel died on October 30, 2014 of Alzheimer's disease in Kansas City, Missouri, aged 90. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American wrestlers Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Sportspeople from Iowa
title: Bob Geigel
